sentences.sContent: Housing savings interest rate unchanged from first to last, from the capital market interest rate fluctuations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Housing savings interest rate unchanged from first to last, from the capital market interest rate fluctuations.
sentences.sCn: 住房储蓄利率自始至终固定不变，不受资本市场利率波动的影响。

sentences.sContent: It may be higher than the note rate because it represents full disclosure of the interest rate, loan origination fees, loan discount points, and other credit costs paid to the lender.
sentences.sContent_eng: It may be higher than the note rate because it represents full disclosure of the interest rate, loan origination fees, loan discount points, and other credit costs paid to the lender.
sentences.sCn: 这可能是高于您所知道的利率，因为它完全计算了利息率，贷款发放费，贷款贴息点，和其他信贷成本支付给贷款人。

trans.tranOther: the percentage amount charged by a bank etc when you borrow money, or paid to you by a bank when you keep money in an account there
